4_micro_examples: Statement: 'All students must wear uniforms.' Conclusion: Uniform is compulsory for students.
Statement: 'The train is late.' Conclusion: The train did not arrive on time.
Statement: 'Use eco-friendly bags.' Conclusion: Eco-friendly bags are preferred.
Statement: 'You should exercise daily.' Conclusion: Daily exercise is recommended.
Statement: 'Please close the door.' Conclusion: The door is open.

5_exam_examples.question: Statement: 'Government should promote renewable energy.' Conclusion: Renewable energy is beneficial.
Statement: 'Students should study regularly.' Conclusion: Regular study leads to success.
solution_steps: Conclusion: Regular study leads to success

5_exam_examples.question: Statement: 'All employees must wear ID cards.' Conclusion: Some employees may not wear ID cards otherwise.
solution_steps: Conclusion: Some may not wear ID cards

5_exam_examples.question: Statement: 'The city needs more hospitals.' Conclusion: Existing hospitals are insufficient.
Statement: 'Please switch off the lights.' Conclusion: The lights are on.
